text: Ines Mandl (April 4, 1917 â€“ August 5, 2016) was an Austrian-born American biochemist. He was awarded the Garvan-Olin Medal in 1983 for her work on the enzyme collagenase.Ines Mandl, Collagenase (Gordon and Breach 1972). She was a professor at Columbia University. He was born in Vienna. Mandl died on August 5, 2016 at the age of 98.Ines Mandl Obituary == References == Category:1917 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American biochemists Category:Scientists from Vienna
